title: Computer-Based Language Education Courseware Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized courseware design for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to improve elementary language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and reconstruct language domain models in a GTE-based environment
Learners can quantitatively measure language learning outcomes using courseware evaluation tools
Learners can diagnose individual language proficiency gaps based on dynamic learner models
Learners can design language education materials using reusable content representation methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
